q: director Mike Pence Connolly puts it in even more certain terms: "Washington's loss is Indiana's gain." Connolly speaks as if Mike Pence 's gubernatorial run- and victory- were a fait accompli. Although Mike Pence would have been a very attractive presidential candidate, it is obvious this is the right decision for him and his family right now. He will be a great successor to Mitch Daniels , Connolly says. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
